body_html: We typically use a tf.train.Saver (which is implicitly created by the tf.train.Supervisor) to handle periodic checkpointing and restoring variables from a checkpoint on restart. Are you using those in your program?
body_text: We typically use a tf.train.Saver (which is implicitly created by the tf.train.Supervisor) to handle periodic checkpointing and restoring variables from a checkpoint on restart. Are you using those in your program?
body: We typically use a `tf.train.Saver` (which is implicitly created by the `tf.train.Supervisor`) to handle periodic checkpointing and restoring variables from a checkpoint on restart. Are you using those in your program?
